AIMA Sample Exercises

This page is meant to serve as a proof of concept for hosting AIMA-Exercises.

  • Click on the burger icon on top-left to toggle TOC.
  • Click on the icon on top-right to toggle header.
  • Choose a chapter from TOC to view its corresponding exercises.
  • Navigate back and forth between pages using the breadcrumb beside burger icon.
